overviewSection.title: App Overview
overviewSection.text: This is a Pokémon Explorer application, built as part of the <courseLink>{courseName}</courseLink>. It allows users to search for Pokémon by name, view their details, and see their images, all powered by the Pokémon API.

courseSection.title: The Course
courseSection.text: This project is a practical assignment from the <courseLink>{courseName}</courseLink>.

ErrorPage.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
ErrorPage.description: We are sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.
